<$96>The leader of Nobilia, up to the north, just came into power.<New>
I'd only trust him as far as I could throw him.<New>
I'm not sure what that means,<S $3D $80> but it sounds tough.<New>

<$96>The leader of Nobilia, up to the north, just came into power.<New>
I'd only trust him as far as I could throw him.<New>
I'm not sure what that means,<S $3D $80> but it sounds tough.<New>
<$96>You're not after treasure and riches like the rest of these louts,<S $79 $80> are you?<$86>The last thing we need is more adventurers around here.<New>\n
<$96>You're not after treasure and riches like the rest of these louts,<S $79 $80> are you?<$86>The last thing we need is more adventurers around here.<New>\n
<$96>My brother, Tiny, told me that his actions made a tunnel open up on the west side of the river.<New>\nI think he went over there to take a look.<New>\n

<$96>My brother, Tiny, is the strongest man in these parts.<New>\n
